  1. from django.db import models
  2. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  3. from cms.models import CMSPlugin
  6. class GoogleMap(CMSPlugin):
  7. """
  8. A google maps integration
  9. """
  10. title = models.CharField(_("map title"), max_length=100, blank=True,
  11. null=True)
  13. address = models.CharField(_("address"), max_length=150)
  14. zipcode = models.CharField(_("zip code"), max_length=30)
  15. city = models.CharField(_("city"), max_length=100)
  17. content = models.CharField(_("additional content"), max_length=255,
  18. blank=True,
  19. help_text=_('Displayed under address in the bubble.'))
  20. ZOOM_LEVELS = map(lambda c: (c, str(c)), range(22))
  21. zoom = models.PositiveSmallIntegerField(_("zoom level"),
  22. choices=ZOOM_LEVELS, default=13)
  24. lat = models.DecimalField(_('latitude'), max_digits=10, decimal_places=6,
  25. null=True, blank=True,
  26. help_text=_('Use latitude & longitude to fine '
  27. 'tune the map position.'))
  28. lng = models.DecimalField(_('longitude'), max_digits=10, decimal_places=6,
  29. null=True, blank=True)
  31. route_planer_title = models.CharField(_("route planer title"),
  32. max_length=150, blank=True, null=True,
  33. default=_('Calculate your fastest way to here'))
  34. route_planer = models.BooleanField(_("route planer"), default=False)
  36. width = models.CharField(_('width'), max_length=6, default='100%',
  37. help_text=_('Plugin width (in pixels or percent).'))
  38. height = models.CharField(_('height'), max_length=6, default='400px',
  39. help_text=_('Plugin height (in pixels).'))
  41. def __unicode__(self):
  42. return u"%s (%s, %s %s)" % (self.get_title(), self.address,
  43. self.zipcode, self.city,)
  45. def get_title(self):
  46. if self.title is None:
  47. return _("Map")
  48. return self.title
  50. def get_lat_lng(self):
  51. if self.lat and self.lng:
  52. return (self.lat, self.lng)
